description:
The user

---
The user id (/users/__$userId__/) can be:
- the simplelogin id if the user is authenticated
- the user email (OAuth)
- a push id for anonymous

status.description: User status. Aggregates user devices statuses

lastSeen.description: Last seen timestamp. Can be used for cleaning purposes. Replaces 'wasInsideReach'.

devices.description: List of the user's connected devices
